name: Backgammon ∞
description:
Backgammon is one of the funniest and oldest games in a convenient format. You can play matches anywhere with your friends and you don't have to carry heavy game board with you. Now the full version is available for your device. You can use this app to play against another person on the same device. Beautiful graphics and animation please the eye. The well designed guide helps you learn the game.

Features:
• Human vs PC.
• Human vs Human.
• Universal app for the iPhone, iPod Touch and iPad.
